quotes.quote: Love is the ability and willingness to allow those that you care for to be what they choose for themselves without any insistence that they satisfy you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Love is written by the soul.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Love is a flower that should never cease to grow. Nurture it, and it will outlive you. Neglect it, and it will wilt away and die.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Love is the poetry of the senses!
quotes.author: Honor√© de Balzac

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is the energy of life.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: To love is to recognize yourself in another.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Love is alive when there's music in your heart.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: In love, one and one are one.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre
